channel.title: {PKSX} PKScapeX - Hosted on a VPS!
channel.description:
[b](¯`·._)About PKScapeX(¯`·._)[/b]
[b]Firstly i would like to say, i cba with flaming this time, if you flame me i'll just report it[/b]
PKScapeX is a server started basically from scratch, well, SantasHeaven source which has practically nothing on it! ;P
I have done quite a bit of coding on it so far, adding:
Some extra Handlers to reduce lag Full Woodcutting Full Firemaking Full Fletching Full Fishing Full Cooking Full Mining Full Smelting Full Runecrafting
There will be no crap in this server, none!
PKScapeX is hosted on a VPS (Virtual Private Server) basically, a computer dedicated just to running PKScapeX, with 960MB Ram and a 3.0Ghz processor, holding up to 200 - 400 players with no lag, depending on what the server turns out like.
[b](¯`·._)Some Skills in Detail(¯`·._)[/b]
Runecrafting;
I have made runecrafting fully myself, basically you go to the Zammy Mage in wilderness (North of edge) and talk to him to get to the Abyss, you then go in the portal of your choice, which takes you to the Runecrafting Altar. You then click the Altar and it replaces all ess in your inventory with the runes, however you need a certain level to make each rune, and the higher your level, the more runes you make, for example at 96 Runecrafting you can make 3x Nats! Every rune will be able to be made multiple of the higher your level.
Woodcutting, Mining & Fishing;
These are not 100% like real runescape, because it doesn't "Auto Mine" as such, you have to click for every ore, log, or fish. But the better your axe for woodcutting, pickaxe for mining, or level for fishing, the quicker you chop/mine/catch.
[b](¯`·._)Recruitment(¯`·._)[/b]
[b]WE ARE RECRUITING CODERS & BETA TESTERS[/b]
To apply, please fill out this form and post it.
[code] [b]Real Name:[/b] [b]Real Age:[/b] [b]Position Wanted:[/b] BETA Tester/Coder [b]Skills in Position:[/b] Why should we choose you for this position? [b]Rating in Position:[/b] How would you rate yourself for your position choice? [b]Will you do your job as good as you can:[/b] [/code]
[b](¯`·._)Last Information(¯`·._)[/b]
To contact me, you can add stanyer7@hotmail.co.uk to MSN Messenger, alternatively you may PM me on here!
Ryan PKScapeX Owner.
